```{r}
library(tidyverse)

library(dplyr)

library(readr)
Tesla_Deaths_Deaths_1_ <- read_csv("Tesla_Deaths_Deaths_1_.csv")

New_Tesla <- Tesla_Deaths_Deaths_1_ %>%
mutate(
Dscrip = if_else(
str_detect(Description, "DUI"),
"DUI",
"other"
)
)
```



view(New_Tesla)


```{r}
New_Tesla %>%
ggplot() +
geom_freqpoly(aes(x = Year, color = Dscrip, )) +
labs(
title = "DUI",
x = "year",
y = "Description"
)
```

```{r}
New_Tesla %>%
  count(Dscrip)
```

```{r}

New_Tesla %>%
  count(Dscrip) %>%
  mutate(percent = n / sum(n) * 100)
```

DUI make up 2.5 percent of the Tesla deaths in the years 2013 - 2022.
